text: We contacted LetaGeek and they were very quick to respond and helped us set up an appointment the next day. The technician was professional and and friendly! He helped us mount our 2 TVs under an hour, greatly exceeding our expectations…we highly recommend their services!

This was an amazing experience. Beshoy was friendly, informative, and very good at his job. He was explaining what he was doing every step of the way and made sure we were satisfied with the end result. You think mounting a tv is straight forward but there’s a lot that goes into it. If I have any other future tv to mount, I know exactly who to ask. Thanks Beshoy!
I recently hired LetaGeek to mount my TV, and they totally nailed it. Great price compared to Geeksquad. Professional, great work, and super friendly. Highly recommended for a stress-free mount!

Beshoy is super friendly and very professional! He was thorough and gave explanations and recommendations every step of the way! I’m super satisfied and happy with his service! I highly recommend him and LetAGeek!
Beshoy did an amazing job mounting our tv! He even gave us some tips on making our next tv purchase when we need it. Good price as well. I will definitely use Leta Geek again in the future.
Beshoy did a great job mounting my TV. I could tell he knew what he was doing with his explanations and options he provided me. He was quick, efficient, and respectful

The tech that arrived to mount my tv was awesome. He was professional , had great communication about my options for placement. He was done in less than 30 minutes. I will definitely be recommending him to my friends and family !
I had such a great experience. Not only was he very flexible with day and time but he was prompt and courteous. The work was done perfectly & very fast...I strongly recommend!

The gentleman was on time and very professional. Install took maybe 20 minutes. Center and level and he made sure everything turned on before he left. I called a few places and he was one of two companies who were able to come same day.
